code: import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RTC=()=>{const videoRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const getMedia=async()=>{try{const stream=await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({video:true});if(videoRef.current){videoRef.current.srcObject=stream;}}catch(err){console.error('Error accessing webcam: ',err);}};getMedia();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"WebRTC Webcam Access"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{ref:videoRef,autoPlay:true,playsInline:true})]});};export default RTC;
